member.name: ISurfaceImageSourceNative.BeginDraw
member.summary: Opens the supplied DXGI surface for drawing.
member.param: The region of the surface that will be drawn into.
Receives a pointer to the surface for drawing.
Receives the point (x,y) offset of the surface that will be drawn into.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISurfaceImageSourceNative.EndDraw
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISurfaceImageSourceNative.SetDevice
member.summary: Sets the DXGI device, created with D3D11_CREATE_DEVICE_BGRA_SUPPORT, that will draw the surface. This method must be called from the UI thread.
member.param: Pointer to the DXGI device interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides the implementation of a shared fixed-size surface for Direct2D drawing.
summary.div: Note If the surface is larger than the screen size, use instead.
